DESCRIPTION.message: Put your favorite free time tracker into any tool you use.

BADGE_TIMER_RUNNING.message: TimeCamp timer is running for this card

PLEASE_REFRESH.message: Please refresh the page to apply changes

select_at_least_one_mandatory_tag.message: Select at least one mandatory tag

add_a_timer_to_the_tool_you_use_and_trac.message: Add a timer to the tool you use and track time with a single click, without switching to another tab.

select_task_to_see_tags.message: Select task to see available tags

no_tags_added_message_administrator.message: Create your first tag to improve your time tracking experience

no_tags_added_message_user.message: Ask your administrator to create first tag list

time_traking_to_task_not_allowed.message: You're not allowed to track time to this task

time_traking_to_project_not_allowed.message: You're not allowed to track time to this project

asana_task_not_found_in_backend_integrat.message: This task is not synchronized in TimeCamp. Choose task by yourself or check workspaces in integration settings

todoist_task_not_found_in_backend_integr.message: This task is not synchronized in TimeCamp. Choose task by yourself.

trello_task_not_found_in_backend_integra.message: This task is not synchronized in TimeCamp. Choose task by yourself or check boards in integration settings

monday_task_not_found_in_backend_integra.message: This task is not synchronized in TimeCamp. Choose task by yourself or check boards in integration settings

backend_integration_ad_message_admin.message: Turn on *linkStart* *service* *linkClose* Integration to import your projects and tasks to TimeCamp automatically.

backend_integration_ad_message_user.message: Ask your Admin to turn on *linkStart* *service* *linkClose* Integration to import your projects and tasks to TimeCamp automatically.

trello_powerup_ad.message: Turn on/enable the power-up for better experience
